fact_list.fact_text: Work zones and their related signage are described under the section 'PART B'.
Signs indicating changes in road direction include 'Left Bend Ahead,' 'Right Bend Ahead,' and 'Series of Bends Ahead.'
The 'Lateral Shift Marker' indicates a lateral change of direction.
Signs such as 'Shoulder Lane Closed Ahead' indicate specific road conditions.
'Pedestrian Path' signage indicates the location of pedestrian pathways.
Supplementary plates like 'Distance' are used to provide additional information for warning signs.
Specific signs mark the 'Start of Work Zone' and 'End of Work Zone.'
